column13: Teach Learn Grow (TLG) bridges the education gap for children in rural and remote Australian communities experiencing disadvantage. TLG addresses educational disparity by providing primary school students with free one-on-one tutoring and mentoring by inspiring and engaging volunteer university students. Pilbara Minerals' 5-year partnership support assists TLG in servicing the East Pilbara region (Yandeyarra, Marble Bar, Strelley and South Hedland).

column13: Earbus Foundation WA (the Foundation) provides ear health screening, treatment, and surveillance to regional and remote communities using roving teams of doctors, audiologists, nurses, and ear, nose, and throat specialists. Pilbara Minerals' 5-year partnership with Earbus enables them to continue providing these services to Yandeyarra, Marble Bar, Strelley, schools, and daycare centres in South Hedland.
